job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to enhancing or refining an AI system, which falls under the broader scope of model improvement or fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions is a core aspect of the Modeling task, as it involves direct interaction with and adjustment of AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies directly involves the exploration and initial development of models and AI approaches.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI capabilities into a customer support system implies building or enhancing software that leverages AI, fitting the Software Development category.

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes improving AI systems, participating in AI model fine-tuning, and integrating AI capabilities. This aligns strongly with the 'GenAI Engineer' profile's focus on designing, developing, and fine-tuning applications built on generative models.
